alert.note: Alert for Humphreys (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued March 01 at 3:42AM CST until March 01 at 12:04PM CST by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers in Tennessee... Duck River Near Hurricane Mills affecting Humphreys County. For the Duck River...including Hurricane Mills...elevated river levels are forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 1215 PM CST. && ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING TO THIS AFTERNOON... ...REPLACES RIVER FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Duck River Near Hurricane Mills. * WHEN...From early this morning to this afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Agricultural land, other low lying areas, and access points along the river from Bucksnort to Taylortown, Cedar Grove, and to Bakerville Rd begin to flood. Portions of Tumbling Creek Rd east of Highway 13 begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:00 AM CST Tuesday the stage was 17.6 feet and rising. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 3:00 AM CST Tuesday was 22.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise. - Action stage is 16.0 feet. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
